refnamediv.refpurpose: Unit generator for resume= kernel parameter

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: systemd-hibernate-resume-generator is a generator that initiates the procedure to resume the system from hibernation. It instantiates the systemd-hibernate-resume@.service8 unit according to the value of resume= parameter specified on the kernel command line, which will instruct the kernel to resume the system from the hibernation image on that device.

refsect1.title: Kernel Command Line
refsect1.para: systemd-hibernate-resume-generator understands the following kernel command line parameters:

listitem.para: Takes a path to the resume device. Both persistent block device paths like /dev/disk/by-foo/bar and fstab5-style specifiers like FOO=bar are supported.
Takes the resume device mount options to use. Defaults rootflags= if not specified.
Do not try to resume from hibernation. If this parameter is present, resume= is ignored.
